Help & Support

TradeUp by Cardflow Labs

Quick Start Guide

Get up and running with TradeUp in just a few minutes:

  1. Install the app from the Shopify App Store
  2. Set up membership tiers (e.g., Silver, Gold, Platinum) with bonus rates
  3. Enroll customers by searching for them or importing from Shopify
  4. Create trade-in batches when customers bring in items
  5. Process bonuses to automatically calculate and apply store credit

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I enroll a customer as a member?

From the dashboard, click "+ Enroll" and search for the customer by name or email. Select them from the results, choose a membership tier, and click "Enroll Member".

How do cashback rewards work?

Cashback rewards give members bonus store credit based on their tier. Members earn a percentage back on purchases and trade-ins, which is applied as store credit for future orders.

How is store credit applied to orders?

Store credit is synced with Shopify as a discount code or gift card (depending on your configuration). Customers can apply it at checkout like any other discount.

Can I import existing customers?

Yes! TradeUp can search your existing Shopify customers. Just search by name or email in the enrollment flow, and we'll find matching customers from your store.

How do I change a member's tier?

Click on a member in the Members list to view their details, then click "Change Tier" to assign a different tier. All tier changes are logged in the member's history.

What happens if I uninstall the app?

Your data is retained for 30 days after uninstallation. If you reinstall within this period, all your data will be restored. After 30 days, data is permanently deleted. You can also request immediate deletion by contacting support.

How do promotional tiers work?

You can create time-limited tier promotions with promo codes. Members can redeem these to temporarily upgrade their tier. When the promotion expires, they revert to their previous tier automatically.

System Status

All Systems Operational

For real-time status updates and incident reports, visit status.cardflowlabs.com

Billing & Plans

TradeUp offers flexible pricing through Shopify Billing:

  • Free: Up to 25 members, basic features
  • Starter ($19/mo): Up to 100 members, all features
  • Growth ($49/mo): Up to 500 members, priority support
  • Pro ($99/mo): Unlimited members, API access, dedicated support

All paid plans include a 7-day free trial. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime from your Shopify admin.
